answers.answer: with my last pregnancy from the time i found out i was pregnant time just seems to fly by, i didnt go full term, I was induced at 38 or 39 weeks. This pregnancy seems to be going by fast too, I'm almost 27 weeks and am due may 23rd and too me it just doesnt seem like its enough time, especially with trying to get my 4 year old ready for the baby.

Is this your first? I thought you had a child but maybe I'm confusing you with someone else. Well I think around 39 weeks I feel more comfortable with using natural induction techniques (lots of sex, lots of walking, etc.). Before then I feel baby might not be done "cooking". I also believe pregnancy can last up to 42 weeks. The only reason doctors consider pregnancy to be 40 weeks was because a German doctor centuries ago stated that as fact and no one refuted it. But evidence has shown that pregnancy is safe up to 42 weeks and even up to 44 weeks. I think getting monitored after 40 weeks, if it makes a mom feel more comfortable, is a great idea as well to make sure the placenta is not deteriorating. However if a mom has risk factors she should be induced as soon as safe for everyone.Okay I'm super rambly and not sure what I just wrote has anything to do with what you're asking, ha ha!It was more like the last month that dragged on for me. I tried to stay busy and do a lot of nesting. When I got bored I'd read, read, read because I knew reading wouldn't come easy with a newborn and I'm a bookworm.

I considered myself almost there the day I was in labour. I had to constantly tell myself I was one day closer to the end. Looking back it went by really fast, but when I was pregnant each day just drug on endlessly.

With my first (DD) I was induced. It happened out of the blue. I got preeclamptic and doctor sent me to labor and delivery, It was all of the sudden, and a shock to me.With this one I pray I wont get preeclampsia at term again. And im going to try to labor naturally. In a way its like being pregnant for the first time again, because my first labor was medically induced.I think so far my pregnancy has flown by, and I cant believe Im 28 wks. I still remember ttc, and wonder who our next bub will be... and here i am 28 wks w a little boy.. Still very unreal and in my mind it seems may is so far away.

My pregnancy went by super fast to me but because I was on bed rest the last two months went by SOOO slow. Rest of it was lightning quick. I was induced with my first so my second I wanted to go into labor by myself. Its a different world waiting for contractions to start and then wondering if you are in labor and rushing to the hospital. I almost missed my epidural (infact because I progressed so fast I wasn't even supposed to have gotten it). I think ill be induced next time. It was a lot less stressful.

LOL. Thats what Im afraid of... the rushing to the hospital! ... in between dropping of DD at my moms house in the other direction from hospital! We'll see.... My baby is due MAy19 and MY DD turns three on MAy 23.... Soooo I am hoping baby comes on his own birthday!

happened that same way for me with my DD, I was 4cm dialated and my blood pressure was really high, when for a regular check up at thats what they said and the next thing i knew they sent me to the hospital to be induced, I hadnt even unpacked any of my baby stuff, that was packed up at my moms lol

Julian - this pregnancy has seemed to go by so quick for me too. I remember peeing on a stick and just bawling my eyes out (a good cry), I remember hearing a heartbeat for the first time (still have it on my phone), and watching my little one say hi to mom on the ultrasound for the first time. Now that I am feeling good movements all the time, I don't want to be done being pregnant!Tuesday I will be 29 weeks and it makes me sad that I am nearing the end. I do feel rushed to have everything in place. I still don't have a crib (next weekend we are getting one) or a carseat/stoller (waiting on mail delivery) and it makes me nervous. I can already feel nesting occuring. When I hit week 30 I am sure I will be in full panic mode!My sister is 5 weeks ahead of me, so when she goes into labor I am sure I will be so terrified that I might go early myself! lol

im 29 weeks and 5 days. it seems like yesterday i found out i was pregnant and the beginning of my pregnancy was soooo slow, and my baby shower is tomorrrow! where does the time go lol idk if it will drag on or fly by until the end though for me. this is my first as well so alot of first timers go over their due date too

In terms of getting ready and preparing.... oh boy. I have all the winter stuff i have to get rid of, spring cleaning.... REDO ISabellas room to fit one more toddler bed.WAY TOO MUCH! I cant even wrap my head around it yet. I think i prolly should. Bc it really is flying by.... and im still staring at my list of things.

question: Hi ladies..... When did you consider your self "almost" there? Im 28 wks along, and it still seems so far away to me!!! I have to keep reminding myself I have almost (10) wks to go!Did the last ten weeks go by quickly for you? or did they drag by?
title: Lovely Bumps =o)
